pages.text: $(l)Many new and tweaked movement options await for your running away needs; $()$(br2)-Fence Jumping:$(br)You can now freely jump over fences.$(br2)-Double Jump:$(br)You can enchant your boots to Double Jump in the air.

$(br2)-Wall Cling:$(br)Jump towards a wall and press $(l)SHIFT$() to cling on it.$(br2)-Wall Jump:$(br)While wall clinging, keep holding $(l)W$() and let go of $(l)SHIFT$() to wall jump.$(br2)-Crawling:$(br)Press $(l)C$() to crawl around.
